attributes.action: End social services failures of the most vulnerable in society
attributes.additional_details:
Please look at these links below.
These are just a few links, but their are many other links available online.

https://theukdatabase.com/uk-child-abusers-named-and-shamed/childhood-abuses/children-that-have-died-from-social-services-failures/ 

https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/amp.theguardian.com/society/2016/dec/22/gloucestershires-handling-of-beaten-child-case-unacceptable

http://www.communitycare.co.uk/2017/02/13/inadequate-council-left-risk-children-waiting-months-social-work-support/
attributes.background: I was in the care system and being looked after by social services as a child and I am just one of many who have been neglected by social services and still to this day many children and vulnerable child and adults across the uk are still being neglected. Don't let this continue.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, for example ask for the Government to hold a review of the provision of social care for children.
